thread.title: Tata Motors Group Global Wholesales Stands At 3,41,791 Units In Q3FY25 - BW BusinessWorld
thread.title_full: Tata Motors Group Global Wholesales Stands At 3,41,791 Units In Q3FY25 - BW BusinessWorld

title: Tata Motors Group Global Wholesales Stands At 3,41,791 Units In Q3FY25 - BW BusinessWorld
text:
Marking an improvement in performance, Tata Motors reported a one per cent year-on-year (YoY) rise in global wholesales in the third quarter of the current financial year (Q3FY25). The Group global wholesales, including Jaguar Land Rover, stood at 3,41,791 units in the quarter ended 31 December 2024.
As per the regulatory filing, the global wholesales of all Tata Motorsâ€™ commercial vehicles and Tata Daewoo range in the recently concluded quarter were at 97,535 units. This marked a one per cent YoY dip as compared to the corresponding period of the last fiscal.
The company stated that global wholesales of Tata Motors passenger vehicles in the quarter were at 1,39,829 units, marking a one per cent growth as compared to the same period in FY24. The passenger vehicles include the sales of electric vehicles.
As far as Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) is concerned, its global wholesales stood at 1,04,427 units, registering a three per cent increase as compared to the third quarter in FY24. However, the JLR number does not include CJLR volumes, which is a joint venture (JV) between JLR and Chery Automobiles. Jaguar wholesales for the quarter were 5,604 vehicles, while Land Rover wholesales for the quarter were 98,823 vehicles, as per the filing.
